title: How to Make Sweetcorn Jelly

steps.headline: Measure and pour the milk and water into a medium sized saucepan.
Bring the mixture to a boil.
steps.description: Stir until the gelatin and sugar is dissolved.

steps.headline: Use a ladle and pour the sweetcorn mixture into individual cups.
Put the cups in the refrigerator and chill them until firm.

text: Measure and pour the milk and water into a medium sized saucepan.  Pour the gelatin powder.  Measure and add the sugar.  Bring the mixture to a boil. Stir until the gelatin and sugar is dissolved. Pour in the sweetcorn.  Use a ladle and pour the sweetcorn mixture into individual cups.  Put the cups in the refrigerator and chill them until firm.  Finished.
